name: Death Shifter
description:
Manage your deaths in order to solve puzzles! Take control of
what kills you and obtain their ability.

Disclaimer : Downloaded version works better. Use it if you can!

Move with WASD, arrow keys or controller DPAD
Skip move with SPACE or controller "A" button
Stone Golems move STONES
Flying Eyeball can move above HOLES
RESET levels by going back up and down the ladders
Return to previous levels using the up ladders
Go to next level using down ladders

XCompWiz
Programming - Level Design - Game Design

Pirhana
Art - Animation - Programming - Game Design

Sister Perish
Music - SFX - Level Design
